author: weikeng
content: I remember one thing important in the design is to have hardware wallet support. I think Zcash has been designed in a way that the hardware wallet only needs to sign something, and the rest of the proof generation could be done on the desktop, which doesn't know the signing key.

author: weikeng
content: I mean, nowadays, to securely hold a key, you either get an iPhone or get a hardware wallet...
